column5: Posted this for Big Cliff , hope it makes him smile!!  We just picked up our newest member of the family on thursday, his name is Loki ( and he is living up to his name )  His father is Munch of the Iam's dogfood commercial, the bulldog with the insides that running like a well oiled machine.  The breeder took this photo and others for us before we picked him up, I think he will be in a few calendars coming up she said.  7lbs of fury!!
I LOVE bullies!  A cute pup for sure.
I am glad it wasn't you who dressed the poor pup  nice people don't dress their animals up in clothing
What a cutie, makes me want to get one  Congrats on the new addition to the family
The big question is.....What does the inside of his ears smell like??????
They like to go fishing too.
